name: UIControl.Event
desc: Constants describing the types of events possible for controls.

items.name: static var touchDown: UIControl.Event
items.desc: A touch-down event in the control.

items.name: static var touchDownRepeat: UIControl.Event
items.desc: A repeated touch-down event in the control; for this event the value of the UITouch tapCount method is greater than one.

items.name: static var touchDragInside: UIControl.Event
items.desc: An event where a finger is dragged inside the bounds of the control.

items.name: static var touchDragOutside: UIControl.Event
items.desc: An event where a finger is dragged just outside the bounds of the control.

items.name: static var touchDragEnter: UIControl.Event
items.desc: An event where a finger is dragged into the bounds of the control.

items.name: static var touchDragExit: UIControl.Event
items.desc: An event where a finger is dragged from within a control to outside its bounds.

items.name: static var touchUpInside: UIControl.Event
items.desc: A touch-up event in the control where the finger is inside the bounds of the control.

items.name: static var touchUpOutside: UIControl.Event
items.desc: A touch-up event in the control where the finger is outside the bounds of the control.

items.name: static var touchCancel: UIControl.Event
items.desc: A system event canceling the current touches for the control.

items.name: static var valueChanged: UIControl.Event
items.desc: A touch dragging or otherwise manipulating a control, causing it to emit a series of different values.

items.name: static var menuActionTriggered: UIControl.Event
items.desc: A menu action has triggered prior to the menu being presented.

items.name: static var primaryActionTriggered: UIControl.Event
items.desc: A semantic action triggered by buttons.

items.name: static var editingDidBegin: UIControl.Event
items.desc: A touch initiating an editing session in a UITextField object by entering its bounds.

items.name: static var editingChanged: UIControl.Event
items.desc: A touch making an editing change in a UITextField object.

items.name: static var editingDidEnd: UIControl.Event
items.desc: A touch ending an editing session in a UITextField object by leaving its bounds.

items.name: static var editingDidEndOnExit: UIControl.Event
items.desc: A touch ending an editing session in a UITextField object.

items.name: static var allTouchEvents: UIControl.Event
items.desc: All touch events.

items.name: static var allEditingEvents: UIControl.Event
items.desc: All editing touches for UITextField objects.

items.name: static var applicationReserved: UIControl.Event
items.desc: A range of control-event values available for application use.

items.name: static var systemReserved: UIControl.Event
items.desc: A range of control-event values reserved for internal framework use.

items.name: static var allEvents: UIControl.Event
items.desc: All events, including system events.
